channel.title: CVE Feed for themewinter -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for themewinter -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-43135|2024-08-13T10:57:55.675Z -- themewinter -- wpcafe
item.description: Improper Limitation of a Pathname to a Restricted Directory ('Path Traversal') vulnerability in Themewinter WPCafe allows PHP Local File Inclusion.This issue affects WPCafe: from n/a through 2.2.28.

item.title: CVE-2024-37507|2024-08-02T03:57:39.538Z -- themewinter -- eventin
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Themewinter Eventin allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Eventin: from n/a through 3.3.57.

item.title: CVE-2024-37513|2024-08-02T03:57:39.422Z -- themewinter -- wpcafe
item.description: Improper Limitation of a Pathname to a Restricted Directory ('Path Traversal') vulnerability in Themewinter WPCafe allows Path Traversal.This issue affects WPCafe: from n/a through 2.2.27.

item.title: CVE-2024-1855|2024-08-01T18:56:22.266Z -- themewinter -- wpcafe%20%E2%80%93%20online%20food%20ordering%2C%20restaurant%20menu%2C%20delivery%2C%20and%20reservations%20for%20woocommerce
item.description: The WPCafe – Restaurant Menu, Online Ordering for WooCommerce, Pickup / Delivery and Table Reservation plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Server-Side Request Forgery in all versions up to, and including, 2.2.23 via the wpc_check_for_submission function. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to make web requests to arbitrary locations originating from the web application.

item.title: CVE-2024-37507|2024-07-22T20:29:12.745Z -- themewinter -- eventin
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Themewinter Eventin allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Eventin: from n/a through 3.3.57.

item.title: CVE-2024-6033|2024-07-18T13:39:16.897Z -- themewinter -- event%20manager%2C%20events%20calendar%2C%20tickets%2C%20registrations%20%E2%80%93%20eventin
item.description: The Event Manager, Events Calendar, Tickets, Registrations – Eventin plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized data importation due to a missing capability check on the 'import_file' function in all versions up to, and including, 4.0.4. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with Contributor-level access and above, to import events, speakers, schedules and attendee data.

item.title: CVE-2024-37513|2024-07-09T12:18:28.378Z -- themewinter -- wpcafe
item.description: Improper Limitation of a Pathname to a Restricted Directory ('Path Traversal') vulnerability in Themewinter WPCafe allows Path Traversal.This issue affects WPCafe: from n/a through 2.2.27.

item.title: CVE-2024-5431|2024-06-25T05:41:46.543Z -- themewinter -- wpcafe%20%E2%80%93%20online%20food%20ordering%2C%20restaurant%20menu%2C%20delivery%2C%20and%20reservations%20for%20woocommerce
item.description: The WPCafe – Online Food Ordering, Restaurant Menu, Delivery, and Reservations for WooCommerce plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Local File Inclusion in all versions up to, and including, 2.2.25 via the reservation_extra_field shortcode parameter. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with Contributor-level access and above, to include remote files on the server, potentially resulting in code execution

item.title: CVE-2024-1855|2024-06-06T13:13:26.788Z -- themewinter -- wpcafe%20%E2%80%93%20online%20food%20ordering%2C%20restaurant%20menu%2C%20delivery%2C%20and%20reservations%20for%20woocommerce
item.description: The WPCafe – Restaurant Menu, Online Ordering for WooCommerce, Pickup / Delivery and Table Reservation plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Server-Side Request Forgery in all versions up to, and including, 2.2.23 via the wpc_check_for_submission function. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to make web requests to arbitrary locations originating from the web application.

item.title: CVE-2024-5427|2024-06-04T18:02:57.464Z -- themewinter -- wpcafe%20%E2%80%93%20online%20food%20ordering%2C%20restaurant%20menu%2C%20delivery%2C%20and%20reservations%20for%20woocommerce
item.description: The WPCafe – Online Food Ordering, Restaurant Menu, Delivery, and Reservations for WooCommerce plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the plugin's Reservation Form shortcode in all versions up to, and including, 2.2.24 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping on user supplied attributes. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with contributor-level access and above, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.

item.title: CVE-2024-5431|2024-06-26T18:47:08.904Z -- themewinter -- wpcafe%20%E2%80%93%20online%20food%20ordering%2C%20restaurant%20menu%2C%20delivery%2C%20and%20reservations%20for%20woocommerce
item.description: The WPCafe – Online Food Ordering, Restaurant Menu, Delivery, and Reservations for WooCommerce plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Local File Inclusion in all versions up to, and including, 2.2.25 via the reservation_extra_field shortcode parameter. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with Contributor-level access and above, to include remote files on the server, potentially resulting in code execution

item.title: CVE-2024-6033|2024-07-17T06:45:07.709Z -- themewinter -- event%20manager%2C%20events%20calendar%2C%20tickets%2C%20registrations%20%E2%80%93%20eventin
item.description: The Event Manager, Events Calendar, Tickets, Registrations – Eventin plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized data importation due to a missing capability check on the 'import_file' function in all versions up to, and including, 4.0.4. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with Contributor-level access and above, to import events, speakers, schedules and attendee data.

item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Themewinter Eventin allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Eventin: from n/a through 3.3.57.
